page.title: 12A Boy's Day
page.content: I get up at 7.30am. get dressed and go down for a cup of coffee. At 8.30am. I get my 5-speed racing cycle and ride to school. It takes about 10 minutes. The boys play football till 9.00am. when we go into lessons.We first do mental arithmetic then maths.At 9.45 we go to prayers till 10.00. Half an hour later is play.Most boys play football each play. 10.00 means some English work until lunch at noon.The afternoon starts at 1.pm. and we have different lessons each day. We have a short break at 2.30. School ends at 3.30pm. Once I am home I watch television until 5.30 when the family has tea. Afterwards I use my Commodore 64 computer until 7.30 when I watch TV again until my bedtime at 10.30 pm. Soon another day starts.
